title: GIVE BACK THE PEG-LEG

embed.description: Buccaneer Tristana Rework Update Skin Spotlight on League of Legends PBE! ➲WTFast,lower your ping and lag! - http://bit.ly/WTFastLoL ●LoLeaks App● (Stay up to date with uploads) ►Chrome - http://bit.ly/AppChrome ►Mozilla - http://bit.ly/AppMozilla ★Buy Games or RP Cards - https://www.g2a.com/r/loleaks (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ Join LoLeaks Army!

body: We wish for the 2015 Tristana rework to keep her Peg-Leg in the Buccaneer Tristana skin. Please Riot we dearly love that little flab of wood and dont wanna see it go :(
